items.content:
Hi Federico Asperges

Thanks for submitting a request for a full end-to-end live streaming consultation service from the MPO LIVE team.


As mentioned on MPO Livestream Support - FAQ for GBS and PMM, we require at least 2 week notice before the live event. Since your client's live stream is in 2 days, youur request does not meet this requirement. Therefore we will not be able to provide end-to-end support in this case. We are at capacity and do not have any resources to fulfill your support request. 


I will share some useful information here and steps that you can take to help your client with their live stream.


Allowlist CI to Live

To use Community Interaction to Live, you will need to allowlisted your client (it's still in Beta). Please add the client's details to the following list. Here: CI to LIVE - Allowlist Request tracker. More information about CI to Live here: [Commdoc] Community Interaction to LIVE (Beta)


Process time: up to 5 working days 



TnS protection

To minimise the risk of TnS banning this live stream, it is recommended to apply for TnS protection. However, it usually takes 3-5 working days for TnS to process requests. Due to the short notice request, there is a chance that protection will not be ready on time.

If you client run CI to LIVE campaign, please read SOP and apply with campaign ID using this link: vcp.to/tns .

If you client does not run CI to LIVE campaign, you can use use the Decision Assurance process here: vcp.to/da


Process time: 3-5 working days 



OBS LIVE Access / LIVE STUDIO access

Many advertisers stream to TikTok by using professional streaming software and not by using their mobile device camera. If this is what your client is interested in, you will need to apply for OBS LIVE Access or LIVE STUDIO Access for your client (depending on what they need, more info in the guides). Video guide on how to apply here. Doc here.


Process time: 2-4 working days 


Hope you find your information useful. We will be happy to provide you support next time your client go live with CI to LIVE campaign. Please apply at least 2 weeks in advance. The sooner the better. 


Best regards, 

Itay

items.label: Livestream Name (for internal use)

MPO's Livestream Consultation program is designed to cover the end-to-end experience of delivering a successful livestream. GBS must request support at least 2 weeks before the livestream to ensure we have adequate time and capacity to plan for your client's event.
Client Name
Client Region
Date of the livestream
Estimated start time of Livestream (please specify timezone)
Estimated planned duraion of Livestream (in minutes)
Concept and content of the livestream
Advertiser ID
Ad Account ID
UID of the TikTok account the client will go live from
Handle of the account the client will go live from
UID of the test account the client will use for technical checks
Handle of test account the client will use for technical checks
Onwnership of the The TikTok account that will go live
Client Vertical
Livestream type
content: Desktop OBS/RTMP LIVE (Live is conducted using professional streaming software)
key: Desktop OBS/RTMP LIVE (Live is conducted using professional streaming software)

items.label: Mutli-channel: will the client livestream to other platforms in addition to TikTok (such as YouTube, Facebook, Twitch, Linkedin)
Is the client hiring a production company?
What Livestream Traffic Solution is the client going to use?
How much ad spend (US$) is the client planning to allocate towards Livesteam Traffic Solutions (TopView or CI to Live)?
What is the total campaign ad budget for this live stream (pre-Live, mid-Live, and post-Live)?
Is this campaign already being supported by a content/ editorial/ live-ops team?
Requester details: Name (Lark)
Please add any internal names you want us to add to the Lark group discussion on next steps (if we create a Lark group)?
Additional information you would like to add
If there is a file or screenshot you would like to share with us, please upload here (optional)
